availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Carter Richardson loser (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney. Louisville, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel Q. Richardson and Mary H. Harrison Richardson. Married to Mary Louise Harris Richardson. Father of Carter Richardson. Graduate of Transylvania University in 1846. Graduate of Transylvania School of Law in 1848. Attorney in Covington from 1850 to 1896. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Kenton County from 1855 to 1859. Superintendent of public instructions from 1869 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, Covington Ward 7, p. 908.
